Sentencas: To achieve environmental sustainability and low carbon emissions in the field of marine power systems, it is crucial to enhance system performance in both the fuel subsystem and power subsystem.
Titulo: Integrated analysis and performance optimization of fuel cell engine cogeneration system with methanol for marine application

Sentencas: This study introduces a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) engine cogeneration system utilizing methanol fuel designed specifically for marine applications.
Titulo: Integrated analysis and performance optimization of fuel cell engine cogeneration system with methanol for marine application

Sentencas: Methanol serves as a hydrogen source for the SOFC through online reforming, producing hydrogen.
Titulo: Integrated analysis and performance optimization of fuel cell engine cogeneration system with methanol for marine application

Sentencas: The engine further enhances energy efficiency by utilizing the anode tail gas from the SOFC.
Titulo: Integrated analysis and performance optimization of fuel cell engine cogeneration system with methanol for marine application

Sentencas: The study employs the energy, economy, and environment (3E) analysis method to assess the system's performance.
Titulo: Integrated analysis and performance optimization of fuel cell engine cogeneration system with methanol for marine application

Sentencas: Results demonstrate that the system exhibits high energy efficiency and low carbon emissions.
Titulo: Integrated analysis and performance optimization of fuel cell engine cogeneration system with methanol for marine application

Sentencas: The system configuration is optimized, and design points are determined through parameter optimization.
Titulo: Integrated analysis and performance optimization of fuel cell engine cogeneration system with methanol for marine application

Sentencas: The rated power generation efficiency of the system can reach 59.57 %, which is nearly 20 % absolute efficiency improvement compared to methanol engines.
Titulo: Integrated analysis and performance optimization of fuel cell engine cogeneration system with methanol for marine application

Sentencas: An analysis of the system's performance under partial load conditions reveals that, even at 53 % load, the power generation efficiency remains at 53.29 %.
Titulo: Integrated analysis and performance optimization of fuel cell engine cogeneration system with methanol for marine application

Sentencas: The total life cycle carbon emissions for the system is 319.78 g/kWh, significantly lower than the engine.
Titulo: Integrated analysis and performance optimization of fuel cell engine cogeneration system with methanol for marine application

Sentencas: The levelized cost of energy for the system are 0.1161 $/kWh, slightly higher than engine power generation costs.
Titulo: Integrated analysis and performance optimization of fuel cell engine cogeneration system with methanol for marine application
